mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERLIST (MEMBER_ID, MEM_NAME, MEM_PW, MEM_ADDR, MEM_BIRTH, MEM_PHONE, MEM_EMAIL) VALUES(#{memberId}, #{memName}, #{memPw},#{memAddr},#{memBirth}, #{memPhone},#{memEmail})
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID , MEM_NAME ,MEM_EMAIL FROM MEMBERLIST m WHERE MEMBER_ID IN (SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBERLIST m MINUS SELECT MEM_ID FROM PROJMEMLIST p)
